transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir very good evening sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sorry good evening sir.
Customer: Na Krishna Prasad India Mart manager Prasad. Eppidi irukinga?
Executive: Okay tell me.
Customer: How are you sir?
Executive: Yeah it's going on let's tell me first time. Thank you sir thank you. How is India Mart is going sir any support required from my team sir any inputs required actually. Please let me know yesterday somebody have called me in the evening around 7 o'clock.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: They said the team the backend team and they said today morning we will have a video meet and all. So I was ready they had sent the link also but nobody has got connected.
Customer: Okay I'm I'm informing are you free now?
Executive: No no.
Customer: Okay sir kindly let me know your available time informing Mr. Rokini to connect connect you for an video meet. I'm just informing her to drop a message on your WhatsApp WhatsApp kindly let me know available time to connect for video meet.
Customer: Okay 4 o'clock.
Executive: Sorry sir?
Customer: 4 o'clock.
Executive: By today after half an hour right?
Customer: Huh.
Executive: Okay sir I'm informing her to connect to the same link okay. And and kindly let me know what in which places you are required and support I'm informing. See I'm not getting very very very let me be very clear.
Customer: Okay I am not getting any inquiry.
Executive: Okay sir got it. every Sunday I'm getting a message 20 what has been allocated to you. Well today I got a message it will expire now. But when I open I'm not finding anything. Only two inquiries were there that is 5 KVA 7 KVA around which I'm not dealing.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Nothing else is there. Then how you are saying that 20 buyleads have been allocated to you where is that 20 leads how to see that?
Executive: Got it actually. my my have one doubt sir actually may know what are the which are the locations till which locations we are dealing actually and what are the MOQ we are focusing. I I am from Kerala. Okay okay I am dealing in Alappey, Koshel, Iduki, Pathanamthitta four districts.
Customer: Only for these four districts only you are focusing right?
Executive: Yeah I have allocated only that area.
Executive: Got it sir got it. for example when you are crossing for these locations we are not permitted to for the for the rest of locations right am I right?
Customer: I didn't understand.
Executive: Apart from these four locations we are not supposed to sell this product in that particular location right?
Customer: Cochin also it's okay. Cochin also it's okay. Then Kollam is there. If something good is there then I can do it.
Executive: Got it sir got it. Even if it is but that means from Ernakulam or Cochin to South. South okay got it got it.
Customer: Good there. only seven districts are there. Okay from Ernakulam to only seven districts are there which which in which I am doing four. But the other three also if some good leads are there I can go after that but unfortunately nothing is coming.
Executive: Got it sir got it okay.
Customer: See when you send that email every Sunday you will send email email 20 buyleads have been allocated to you even if you click on to that nothing is coming.
Executive: All Jammu and Kashmir or Punjab is coming. From the very beginning six months it is six months since I have taken this. Last year also it was not this high package it was some other package.
Customer: But that time I was getting more. Now you have preferred customer or some seal customer or what I don't know you have sent me a shield or it is lying down there. But nothing is happening. Six months has gone. Nothing is happening. Zero conversion. Because the leads are not coming then how we can convert.
Executive: What are the buyers are saying sir we are because the reason is we are receiving almost an more than of 70 to 80 buyers through India Mart per month what are the feedback from their side actually.
Customer: From whom?
Executive: From India Mart through India Mart we are receiving minimum of 25 and maximum I am not getting here. If you are getting it is not it is not coming to me. No no see lot of people lot of lot of your managers have called me and said sir don't worry we will get it and we will send you through mail or we will send you through WhatsApp. But that's all after that something is happening.
Customer: No no that is what my my thing is we are receiving inquiries from buyers I am asking their feedback actually you can see through mail and you can see through the lead. No no see let me I am not understanding what you told me you ask me. The thing is that we are we are receiving per month we are consuming an couple of buyleads seven to 10 buyleads in month and also we are receiving an incoming calls five to 10 and also I am getting all this that is what you said. we are receiving from India Mart I can see in our graph actually. You can check in your leading manager. I don't understand I have received some one or two calls that's all.
Executive: Oh apart from this all that is all that is all 5 KVA 10 KVA which I am not dealing.
Customer: Apart from calls we will receive buyer through mail we can see those in. you show me you know same same call only is coming as mail.
Executive: No no call is different. mail inquiries in sense we will receive direct inquiries from buyers we can see those things.
Customer: See that is not happening.
Executive: Kindly but I'm sharing just a screenshot of a graph and we will have I don't know how you have made the graph and all.
Customer: See nothing is coming to me that's what I know.
Executive: Okay let's do one thing we will have a meet we will have a meeting by 4 o'clock you please be available on time I'm informing Rokini to connect over the time okay we will discuss on those things actually okay.
Customer: What is that?
Executive: Hello sir am I audible?
Executive: At the time what you have informed 4 pm right we will have a discussion okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving inquiries or buyleads.

- Dissatisfied with the number of buyleads.

- Queries regarding the locations for dealing.



Resolution:

- Executive will arrange a meeting to discuss issues.

- Executive will inform Rokini to connect with customer.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled at 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, locations, meeting
